code: import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL='http://127.0.0.1:5454';export const getEvents=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/events"));return response.data;};export const createEvent=async description=>{const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/events"),{description});return response.data;};export const placeBet=async(eventId,choice,amount)=>{const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/bet"),{event_id:eventId,choice,amount});return response.data;};
